prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a spooky spirit with a tattered cloak.
Imagine a Pokemon that haunts graveyards, combining dark and eerie elements in its design.
Generate a Pokemon with a round body and a ghostly face, perfect for a Halloween theme.
Show me a Pokemon that blends into shadows, with a haunting yet playful appearance.
Design a spectral creature that floats through forests, with eyes that glow in the dark.
Make a small, enigmatic Pokemon with a mysterious aura and a playful personality.
Give me a unique Pokemon that embodies the essence of the night with ghostly features.
